activeStep.description: Set the active step (zero based index). Set to -1 to disable all the steps.
activeStep.description_zh: 设置活动步骤（从零开始的索引）。设置为 -1 可禁用所有步骤。

alternativeLabel.description: If set to 'true' and orientation is horizontal, then the step label will be positioned under the icon.
alternativeLabel.description_zh: 如果设置为“true”并且方向为水平，则步骤标签将位于图标下方。

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.
classes.description_zh: 覆盖或扩展应用于组件的样式。有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 CSS 类 API。

component.description: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
component.description_zh: 用于根节点的组件。使用 HTML 元素或组件的字符串。

connector.description: An element to be placed between each step.
connector.description_zh: 要放置在每个步骤之间的元素。

nonLinear.description: If set the Stepper will not assist in controlling steps for linear flow.
nonLinear.description_zh: 如果设置步进器将无助于控制线性流量的步进。

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: 允许定义系统覆盖以及其他 CSS 样式的系统属性。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“sx”页面。
